description: Offers unique Buddhist facilities for intimate weddings, including a garden and yurt. Couples can bring their own officiant or inquire about having an ordained clergy member perform the ceremony

address: Colorado (Specific locations vary based on package)

name: Blue Sky Elopements (Maureen Thomson)
